channel.title: Client compile issues
channel.description:
I need the compiler code for Windows 7 64 Bit! I HAVE TRIED EVERYTHING :(
I get this error when trying to compile my client
[code]javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
I have all my variables set, and in the compiler.bat here is what I have [code]@echo off title BattleScape Compiler "C:\Program Files (x86)\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\javac.exe" -cp . *.java pause[/code]

item.title: Client compile issues
item.dc:creator: @Icey69 Icey69
item.description:
@Icey69 wrote:

Still got the same error :\

Read full topic

item.title: Client compile issues
item.dc:creator: @dain_bramage dain bramage
item.description:
@dain_bramage wrote:

@echo off cls title Compiler javac *.java

This should work if they’re in the same folder as the compiler.

Read full topic

item.title: Client compile issues
item.dc:creator: @Icey69 Icey69
item.description:
@Icey69 wrote:

Well, yea I know that. How do I make it find them? they are all in the same folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Client compile issues
item.dc:creator: @jal_knight jal knight
item.description:
@jal_knight wrote:

It can’t find any of your .java files.

Read full topic
